# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/sjcl`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for sjcl (http://crypto.stanford.edu/sjcl/).

Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/sjcl
